text: Little Hope is an unincorporated community in Erie County, Pennsylvania. ==History== The origin of the name "Little Hope" is obscure. A variant name was "Greenfield". A post office called Greenfield was established in 1822, and remained in operation until 1905. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Erie County, Pennsylvania Category:Unincorporated communities in Pennsylvania
title: Little Hope, Pennsylvania
